dialogue.text: The architect was right. Going higher doesn't mean leaving the ground—it means seeing how deep the ground goes.

visual_elements.evan_gesture: Stick pointing down instead of up

psychological_notes: Major reframe of spiritual journey—Evan realizes the architect's grounding exercises weren't preventing ascent but enabling it. The way 'up' is through full presence 'down.' This resolves years of misunderstanding about transcendence vs. immanence.
philosophical_underpinning: Height found in depth, transcendence through radical immanence
therapeutic_direction: Integration of spiritual seeking with embodied presence
